extendedInfo.description: If you are Green Day's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Green Day's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Green Day's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Green Day's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - 39/Smooth- Kerplunk- Dookie- Insomniac- Nimrod- Warning- Shenanigans- American Idiot- 21st Century Breakdown- Â¡Uno!- Â¡Dos!- Â¡TrÃ©!-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - At The Library- 16- 80- 86- Â¡Viva La Gloria!- Â¿Viva La Gloria?
